title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 691/95 of 30 March 1995 on certain transitional measures concerning the import of molasses in the sugar sector as a result of the implementation of the Uruguay Round Agreement on Agriculture
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 691/95 of 30  March 1995 on certain transitional measures concerning the import of molasses in the sugar sector  as a result of the implementation of the Uruguay Round Agreement on Agriculture
THE  COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Notwithstanding Article 5 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No 2630/81, the  duration of validity of import licences for molasses falling within CN codes 1703  10  00 and 1703   90  00, which are issued during the period 1 April 1995 to 30 June 1995, may not extend beyond 30  June 1995.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official  Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 March 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
